description.en: Laboratory projects on different fields of experimental research. It is a work which consists of 3 small different projects based on an experimental or theoretical scientific research. Participants will choose 3 2 ECTS projects, one from the list of project topics of chemistry institute, one of institute of technology, and one of molecular and cell biology institute. The projects cover all major steps of experimental scientific research: hypothesis, model, experiment planning, experiment, analysis of the data and presenting the data in a suitable format. During the course of the project students gets the possibility to familiarise with the research group field of study, learn and practice new research methods. After comletion of each project the student makes a presentation during the seminar. Overall, after the course completion student is able to work in the research laboratory that increases the likelyhood of finding the job.
description.et: Kursusest osavõtjad viivad läbi eksperimentaalseid uurimusprojekte erinevatel aladel. Kursus koosneb kolmest erinevast väikesest projektist, mis sisaldavad kõiki eksperimentaalteadusliku projekti etappe: hüpotees, mudel, eksperimendi plaanimine, eksperiment ja tulemuste analüüs ning korrektne esitamine. Üliõpilased iseseisvalt valivad 3 erinevat 2EAP projekti, millest üks peab olema keemiainstituudist, üks tehnoloogiainstituudist ja üks molekulaar ja rakubioloogia instituudist. Projekti jooksul saab tudeng tutvuda teadusrühma töö teemadega, õppida uusi teadusmeetodeid ja kohe neid praktiseerida, õpib püstitama hüpoteesi, planeerima katseid selle kontrollimiseks, analüüsima saadud tulemusi ja teha andmete põhjal järeldusi. Samuti õppib tudeng esitama teadustulemusi ettekanne vormis. Lõppkokkuvõttes suudab kursuse läbinud õppija töötada teaduslaboris, mis tulevikus soodustab töö otsimist.

objectives.en: The goal is to introduce the students to the scientific process, to try a researcher's role, planning of experiments, and critical reading of scientific literature; develop learning skills. Additionally the goal is to develop the ability to plan, to do and to present the research of different specialty field. Student gets the opportunity to be in the role of researcher. Participant learns to plan working time, arrnages meetings with supervisor(s), selects the most suitable research topic, gets experience and better understanding of the research work. Student learns how to study independently. Overall, the course help students improve the chances to find a good job after graduation.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on arendada tudengi õpimisoskust, teha üliõpilastele sissejuhatus teadusliku protsessi, eksperimendi planeerimise ja eksperimentaalse teaduskirjanduse kriitilise analüüsi osas, õpetada oma tulemuste analüüsi ja esitamist. Lisaks anda võimalust tudengile proovida ennast teadustöötaja rollis. Õpetada plaaneerima oma aega, leppima kokku aja ja tegevusplaani projekti juhandajaga, valima endale sobivat uurimisteemat, töötada iseseisvalt. Eesmärk anda kursuse läbinud üliõpilasele ettekujutuse eksperimentaalse teadustöö iseloomust keemia, bioinseneeria, geenitehnoloogia ja robootika alal ning aidata tudengit  teha eriala valikut. Anda eelistuse tulevikus töö otsimisel peale ülikooli lõpetamist (tudeng omab eri eriala praktika kogemust).

learning_outcomes.en: The participants will become familiar with the laboratory work, with the research work. Will get to know better how to plan, do required experiments, organize and present results of a small research.
learning_outcomes.et: Kursusel osalejad saavad laboratoorse uurimustöö kogemuse. Nad õpivad eksperimente planeerima, tööd organiseerima ja esitama kokkuvõtlikult uurimustöö tulemusi.

learning_outcomes.en: 1) knows how to find necessary information in the scientific literature;
2) is able to formulate the hypothesis;
3) plan the experiments to control the hypothesis;
4) has tried different research methods in the fields of bioengineering, chemistry, and robotics;
learning_outcomes.et: 4)	On proovinud erinevaid teadusmeetodeid bioensineeria, keemia ning robootika alal ja          läbinud praktikat;

learning_outcomes.en: 5) is able to analyse the results of the experiments;
learning_outcomes.et: 5)	Oskab analüüsida eksperimentaalseid andmeid ja teha nende põhjal järeldusi;

learning_outcomes.en: 6) is able to present the results of the work in both oral and written form;
learning_outcomes.et: 6)	Oskab esitada teaduslikke tulemusi nii suulises kui ka kirjalikul viisil;

learning_outcomes.en: 8) knows how to plan working time efficiently;
9) is able to make arrangements with supervisor(s);
10) has practical expirience in the different research fields, which improves the quality of specialisation choice;
learning_outcomes.et: 10)	On saanud praktilist kogemust erinevates erialades, mis aitab teha parimat karjääri valikut;

description.et: Students have to complete one project from the Institute of Technology
Students have to complete one project from the Institute of Chemistry
Students have to complete one project from the Institute of Molecular and Cell Biology
Students have to present the results of each project on seminar to fellow students and faculty members.

grade_preconditions.et: 3 completed projects and 3 presentations of completed projects

grade_evaluation.et:
Institute of Technology project min. 60/100 points 
Institute of Chemistry min. 60/100 points 
Institute of Molecular and Cell Biology project min. 60/100 points

resources.mandatory_materials: It depends on chosen project. The supervisor of the corresponding project provides/advises the materials.
resources.recommended_materials: It depends on the chosen project. The supervisor of the corresponding project provides/advises the materials.
